refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if the string is QName and if it is so then replaces namespace prefix to the full namespace IRI.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Checks if the string is QName and if it is so then replaces namespace prefix to the full namespace IRI. Otherwise signals error if the argument is local IRI without a prefix.

refsect2.title: str
refsect2.para: QName. For ex. if QName is "prefix:local", then conveniently is replaced "prefix:" with the namespace IRI

example.title: Example with FOAF namespace prefix
example.programlisting:
SQL> SELECT __xml_nsexpand_iristr ('foaf:knows'); __xml_nsexpand_iristr VARCHAR _______________________________________________________________________________
http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/knows
1 Rows. -- 0 msec.
